review: This is adequate for the price. Sometimes it is a little glitchy when trying to control it with an ipad.  It would also be nice if there were more apps that would allow you to chromecast. For now it allows me to do netflix which keeps my son happy.

review: Chromecast is Great for using YouTube and HBO GO, but still does not support chrome browser on iPad or my laptop.

review: This is an absolute great device.  The installation is foolproof!  We've enjoyed this product so much, we bought a second one for our family room.

review: This item was received within the time frame advised and in good condition. The setting up process was straight forward without any major trouble. This device does what it is suppose to do very well. However, Netflix can only be cast from my phone & not my Galaxy Tablet. A time out error "16003" keep popping up!
